info.title: Walleto Core API
info.description: Backend API for Walleto Personal Finance Application

tags.name: Regex Patterns
tags.description: API for managing regex patterns used to parse bank SMS

tags.name: Recurring Payments
tags.description: API for managing recurring payments and subscriptions

tags.name: Summary Management
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving financial summaries and category breakdown

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: API for managing user accounts and wallets

tags.name: Categories
tags.description: API for managing income and expense categories

tags.name: SMS Processing
tags.description: API for processing bank SMS messages into transactions

tags.name: Audit Logs
tags.description: API for retrieving audit trail of application activities

tags.name: Transfer Management
tags.description: Endpoints for handling transfers between accounts

tags.name: Balance Management
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving overall and account-specific balances

get.description: Retrieves a transaction by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a transaction by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a specific regex pattern by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a regex pattern by its ID

get.description: Retrieves a specific recurring payment by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a recurring payment by its ID.

put.description: Marks a recurring payment as completed for the current period.
Marks all recurring payments as completed or not completed.

get.description: Retrieves a specific category by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

delete.description: Deletes a category by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

get.description: Retrieves a specific account by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the account to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the account to update

delete.description: Deletes an account by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the account to delete

put.description: Sets the specified account as the default account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the account to set as default

post.description: Initiates a transfer between two accounts owned by the current user

404.description: Not Found - Account or category not found

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or same source/destination

post.description: Searches for transactions based on various criteria.
Parses a bank SMS and creates a transaction if a matching pattern is found.
Parses a batch of bank SMS messages and returns processing statistics.

get.description: Retrieves all regex patterns for the current user

post.description: Creates a new regex pattern for SMS parsing

get.description: Retrieves all recurring payments for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates default account, categories and regex patterns if they do not exist for the current tenant.

get.description: Retrieves all categories for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new category for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves all accounts for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new account for the authenticated user.

patch.description: Links a transaction to a recurring payment and marks the payment as completed.
Toggles whether the transaction is excluded from financial summaries.

get.description: Retrieves the total income, expense, and balance for an account within a date range
Retrieves the income breakdown by category for an account within a date range
Retrieves the expense breakdown by category for an account within a date range
Retrieves the net balance across all accounts for the current user
Retrieves the balance for a specific account for the current user

404.description: Not Found - Account does not exist or access denied

get.description: Retrieves all audit log entries for the current tenant, ordered by timestamp descending.
Retrieves the default account for the authenticated user.

TransactionDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for Transaction details

dateTime.description: Date and time of the transaction

recurringPaymentId.description: ID of the linked recurring payment

ApiResponseTransactionDTO.description: Generic standard API response wrapper class

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

RecurringPaymentDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for Recurring Payment details

id.description: Unique identifier of the recurring payment

dueDay.description: Day of the month the payment is due

expiryDate.description: Expiry date of the recurring payment

lastCompletedDate.description: Date when the payment was last completed

isCompleted.description: Whether the payment for the current period is completed

ApiResponseRecurringPaymentDTO.description: Generic standard API response wrapper class

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

ApiResponseVoid.description: Generic standard API response wrapper class

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

ToggleRequest.description: Request object for toggling all payments

CategoryDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for Category details

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

AccountDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for Account details

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default account for the user

ApiResponseAccountDTO.description: Generic standard API response wrapper class

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

TransferRequestDTO.description: Request payload to initiate a fund transfer between two accounts

fromAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the source account to debit from

toAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the destination account to credit to

amount.description: The transfer amount. Must be greater than zero.

dateTime.description: The date and time of the transfer. Defaults to current timestamp if not provided.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category associated with this transfer (usually a 'Transfer' category type)

description.description: An optional note or description describing the transfer

ApiResponse.description: Generic standard API response wrapper class

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

transactionType.description: Type of transaction to filter by

query.description: Free text search query for description or counterparty

ApiResponseListTransactionDTO.description: Generic standard API response wrapper class

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

SmsDTO.description: Data Transfer Object representing an individual SMS message for processing

body.description: The core text body content of the SMS message
body.example: Spent $50.00 on your card ending in 1234 at Walmart

sender.description: The sender ID or phone number that sent the SMS

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp representing when the SMS was received on the device

BulkSmsDTO.description: Request payload for submitting multiple SMS messages simultaneously

messages.description: List of SMS transactions to be processed

ApiResponseSmsProcessingResultDTO.description: Generic standard API response wrapper class

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful or not

message.description: A friendly response message detailing success status or failure context

data.description: The core generic payload body matching the actual requested resource representation

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the response was generated

AuditLogDTO.description: Data Transfer Object representing an Audit Log entry

id.description: Unique identifier of the audit log

tenantId.description: Tenant ID associated with the log

entityType.description: Type of the entity that was affected

entityId.description: ID of the entity that was affected

username.description: Username of the user who performed the action

changes.description: JSON representation of the changes made

requestPath.description: HTTP request path that triggered the action

requestMethod.description: HTTP request method that triggered the action
